entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 p.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
